info.author: owwlo
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
PyTerminalCommander
===================

|Build Status|

A Python library to provide a divided GUI layout in terminal as an easy
way to build any command-output separated application.

Features
--------

-  Hook up to the stdout and stderr
-  Popup Support
-  Simple interface for easily integrating with any script
-  Customizable theme, overwritable palette

Demo
----

|asciicast|

Installation
------------

Install from pip:

.. code:: sh

    $ sudo pip install PyTerminalCommander

Usage & Configuration
---------------------

Please refer to the example.py

Special Thanks
--------------

Original code is from:
http://zderadicka.eu/terminal-interfaces-in-python/

**Great thanks to Ivan Zderadicka**

info.name: PyTerminalCommander
info.summary: A library use to build command-to-output Shell GUI application.

A Python library to provide a divided GUI layout in terminal as an easy way to build any command-output separated application.

Features

  • Hook up to the stdout and stderr
  • Popup Support
  • Simple interface for easily integrating with any script

Installation
